message: Let's start with a fair split, knowing we both lose value over time. This gives us both a good starting point!
Let's make it equal for both of us. We both face losses over time, so 50/50 seems fair and simple.
I understand the desire for an even split, but I need slightly more to account for my higher inflation rate. I'm only asking for a little bit more to make this worthwhile for both of us.
